title: 678: $100 MILLION PER BITCOIN BY THIS DATE, PREDICTS TOP ASSET MANAGEMENT GIANT! BELARUS TO MINE CRYPTO!
description:
Investment giant Fidelity Group is injecting a heavy dose of hopium in the market with its latest “very special” webinar, where it took a deep dive into Bitcoin and its possible effects on the market.

Now, the firm is putting out bullish reports on Bitcoin and sees BTC hitting $1 million before this decade is over and a whopping $100 million by 2035.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
